short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight potentially invalid or erroneous HTML markup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension for Google's Chrome browser which highlights potentially invalid and erroneous HTML markup.

This extension uses a fork of the Holmes stylesheet which can be found on https://github.com/redroot/holmes.
